alert.note: Alert for Inland Dixie (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 14 at 2:46PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Dixie County through 330 PM EDT... At 246 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Trenton. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cross City, Eugene, Cross City Airport, Old Town and Fanning Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
